Sentencas: La1-x-yCexYbyNbO4 specimens with various Ce and Yb contents were prepared by solid reactions, and their crystal structure, element valence, sinterability and conductivity were investigated.
Titulo: Effect of Ce and Yb co-doping on conductivity of LaNbO4

Sentencas: LaNbO4-type single phase was formed at 1200 degrees C in air, and the lattice of La1-x-yCexYbyNbO4 was distorted from that of LaNbO4 to various extents, depending on the added amount of Ce and Yb.
Titulo: Effect of Ce and Yb co-doping on conductivity of LaNbO4

Sentencas: Both La and Nb remained the same valence as they are in LaNbO4; Ce4+, Ce3+ and Yb3+ were detected at room temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Ce and Yb co-doping on conductivity of LaNbO4

Sentencas: Highly densified La1-x-yCexYbyNbO4 specimens were achieved by sintering at above 1215 degrees C in air with conductivity 1-2 orders higher than that of pure LaNbO4 in dry air, wet air and wet 5% H-2-N-2 atmospheres.
Titulo: Effect of Ce and Yb co-doping on conductivity of LaNbO4

Sentencas: The conductivity changed with testing atmosphere owing to the competition of electron and proton conduction; and maximal value 4.7 x 10(-4)
Titulo: Effect of Ce and Yb co-doping on conductivity of LaNbO4
